final_mermaid_code:
graph TB
    subgraph Department
        Start[Parts required] --> PartsInStock{Parts in stock}
        PartsInStock --yes--> RetrieveParts[Retrieve parts from storage]
        RetrieveParts --> PartsRetrieved[Parts retrieved from storage]
        PartsInStock --no--> SpecifyRequirements[Specify and quantify requirements]
        SpecifyRequirements --> CompleteOrder[Complete a purchase order]
    end

    subgraph ACME AG
        subgraph Central Purchasing
            CompleteOrder --> CheckOrder[Check purchase order]
            CheckOrder -.->|ERP-System| ERPSystem[ERP-System]
            CheckOrder --> VendorKnown{Vendor known?}
            VendorKnown --yes--> CreateOrderTemplate[Create order template from purchase order]
            VendorKnown --no--> CreateVendor[Create vendor]
            CreateVendor --> CheckOrder
        end

        subgraph Approver
            CreateOrderTemplate --> ApproveOrder[Approve purchase order]
            ApproveOrder -.->|ERP-System| ERPSystem
        end
    end

    subgraph Central Purchasing
        CreateOrderTemplate --> ReceiptGoods[Receipt of goods]
        ReceiptGoods --> ParallelGateway{+}
        ParallelGateway --> AdjustOrder[Adjust order status]
        AdjustOrder --> Cancelled[Cancelled due to delivery problems]
        ParallelGateway --> Procured[Parts procured]
    end

    subgraph ERP-System
        CheckOrder -.-> ERPSystem
        CreateOrderTemplate -.-> ERPSystem
        ApproveOrder -.-> ERPSystem
    end
